events.text: Set up question text according to the current question | making each question visible according to their thingamabob

parameters.text: "2. On a scale of 1-5, how environmentally-friendly are you? 1 being “Little sprout (fairly environmentally-friendly)” and 5 being “Eco Master (very environmentally-friendly)”"

"3. What energy-saving practices do you regularly do? 
Options (tick selection, can select more than 1)"

"4. What are the ways in which you reduce your use of single-use plastics?
Options (tick selection, can select more than 1): "
"5. What items do you practice recycling?"
